metadata.title: CVE-2015-8921 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The ae_strtofflags function in archive_entry.c in libarchive before 3.2.0allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read)via a crafted mtree file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8921` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.3
bsdtar - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.3
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-7ubuntu2.3').
